Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - 5G Distributed Unit
 Location : Bangalore
 Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge, and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities.
 What you’ll achieve
 We’re building a new O-RAN compliant 5G NR RAN and we’re looking for talented software engineers to take part in this once in a lifetime opportunity. The Distributed Unit (DU) team has multiple openings for key roles in a new high-powered Bengaluru R&D team. If you enjoy working on a new product, new software, new team, deep desire to learn and collaborate with others, then we want to hear from you. 
You will:

 Work as a key member of an agile scrum team, participate in design and implementation of the DU in 5G RAN
 Own one or more sub-system of the DU solution under development
 Work closely with Architects and System engineers
 Work with 3GPP and O-RAN specifications
 Help train and mentor junior team members
 Develop automated tests using simulators for DU
 Work to identify and drive improvements, contribute towards integration and test automation
 Work closely with the verification group to ensure the completeness, quality and performance of the implemented DU functionality

 Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
 Essential Skills:

 Experience with Lean Agile & Scrum Methodologies, Familiarity with CI/CD principles, Experience working with Linux
 Proficient in C or/and C++ and strong knowledge of 3GPP standards and protocols
 Excellent understanding of LTE and/or 5G RAN architecture, protocols, and procedures
 Working experience of 4G/5G Layer-2 software design with emphasis on RLC, MAC, L2 scheduler and L1/L2 interfaces
 Working experience with embedded debugging tools like Wireshark, gdb
 5+ years’ experience working on development of carrier grade telecommunications products.

 Desired Skills:

 Knowledge of 4G/5G Layer-1 procedure; SCF FAPI interface; DPDK/ODP/VPP; 5G NR Functional Splitst
 Knowledge of O-RAN specifications with emphasis on WG4 CUS and M-Plane

 Benefits We offer highly competitive salaries, bonus programs, world-class benefits, and unparalleled growth and development opportunities — all to create a compelling and rewarding work environment. If you’re keen to be at the forefront of driving world-class technology innovation, this is your opportunity to develop with Dell.  Here’s our story; now tell us yours

 About Colgate-Palmolive

 Do you want to come to work with a smile and leave with one as well? In between those smiles, your day consists of working in a global organization, continually learning and collaborating, having stimulating discussions, and making impactful contributions!
 If this is how you see your career, Colgate is the place to be!
 Our dependable household brands, dedicated employees, and sustainability commitments make us a company passionate about building a future to smile about for our employees, consumers, and surrounding communities. The pride in our brand fuels a workplace that encourages creative thinking, champions experimentation, and promotes authenticity which has supported our enduring success.
 If you want to work for a company that lives by their values, then give your career a reason to smile...every single day.

 The Experience
 In today’s dynamic technology environment, it's an exciting time to belong to the information technology team at Colgate. Our highly technical and innovative team is designated to drive growth for Colgate Palmolive in a landscape that is constantly changing.
 What role will you play as a member of the Colgate’s team ?
 Solution / Technical architect role primary responsibilities to conduct Solution designing reviews, code reviews for all RPA developments
 Ensure developers follow standards and best practices throughout the project lifecycle. Help development team for technical, functional issues. Collaborate with functional, business specialists effectively to complete the projects on time.

 Who are you…
 You are a function specialist -

 Understand and apply information technology standards and best practices to daily support and project implementation activities
 Apply conceptual knowledge and technology to unravel business processes and fix procedural problems
 Lead and/or perform the design, build and testing of business applications and architecture in line with agreed time frames, business requirements and global standards
 Maintain production systems reliability through accurate utilization of GIT standard support and governance processes

 You connect the dots -

 Drive day to day business requirements according to Global SLA
 Review solutions to address business requirements considering priorities and resources available and ensure timely delivery of the solutions
 Ensure the accurate use of IT tools project management GIT 5 step project management methodology to comply of information technology governance practices and conduct audit

 You are a collaborator -

 Build and develop positive relationships with GIT peers, business partners, customers and external resources
 Coordinate / support / lead projects and design frameworks
 Should be able to actively participate in performance management discussion within the category

 You are an innovator -

 Identify and assess new technologies in Test, process Automation, machine learning and concepts that can add value to the business


 What you’ll need…(Required)

 6 + years of work Experience in Solution design and architect role in RPA implementations
 Minimum 2 years of experience in .NETSuite (C# or VB.net)
 4+ Years of experience in leading automation tools, e.g. UiPath
 Basic knowledge of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI)
 Ready to innovate and explore what’s possible in the world of robotics.
 UiPath RPA Solution Architect Certification and Advanced Developer Certification is preferred
 Work experience/POCs on Studio Pro, Document Understanding, AI Centre, Action Centre, and/or Computer vision is a big plus
 Understanding of Enterprise Architecture and IT systems, Process minded, good Presentation and communication skills are essential.
 Experience on RFPs, RFQs, estimations and other similar Technical Documentation is a plus.
 Experience developing and consuming APIs.
 Experience with Agile development methodology
 Ability to work through ambiguous situations.
 Excellent presentation, verbal, and written communication skills.
 Self-motivated, able to work independently, and able to take initiative without always being directed.
 Ability to multitask in a fast paced environment and prioritize the most critical tasks and projects.
 Experience architecting and developing workflow based solutions or functionality
 Ability to work to deadlines and manage expectations
 Ability to express complex technical concepts in business terms and business needs into technical specifications
 Experience with Databases (SQL or NoSQL) is often preferred.
 Understanding of SAP modules (FI, O2I, P2P etc.) is preferable
 UiPath Certified Professionals ( UCP ) preferred.


 What you’ll need…(Preferred)

 Knowledge of Artificial Intelligence and Machine learning
 Experience with Databases (SQL or NoSQL) is often preferred UiPath experience is highly preferred.
 Understanding of SAP modules (FI, O2I, P2P etc.) is preferable


 Equal Opportunity Employer Colgate is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, ethnicity, age, disability, marital status, veteran status (United States positions), or any other characteristic protected by law.
 Are you interested in working for Colgate-Palmolive? You can apply online and attach all relevant documents such as a cover letter and resume or CV. Applications received by e-mail are not considered in the selection process. Become part of our team. We look forward to your application.
 Colgate-Palmolive is a leading global consumer products company, tightly focused on Oral Care, Personal Care, Home Care and Pet Nutrition. Colgate sells its products in over 200 countries and territories around the world under such internationally recognized brand names as Colgate, Palmolive, elmex, Tom’s of Maine, Sorriso, Speed Stick, Lady Speed Stick, Softsoap, Irish Spring, Protex, Sanex, Elta MD, PCA Skin, Ajax, Axion, Fabuloso, Soupline and Suavitel, as well as Hill’s Science Diet and Hill’s Prescription Diet.
 For more information about Colgate’s global business, visit the Company’s web site at http://www.colgatepalmolive.com. To learn more about Colgate Bright Smiles, Bright Futures® oral health education program, please visit http://www.colgatebsbf.com. To learn more about Hill's and the Hill’s Food, Shelter & Love program please visit http://www.hillspet.com. To learn more about Tom’s of Maine please visit http://www.tomsofmaine.com.
 Reasonable accommodation during the application process is available for persons with disabilities. Please contact Application_Accommodation@colpal.com with the subject "Accommodation Request" should you require accommodation.

About 7-Eleven
 For 90 years, 7-Eleven has been successfully meeting customers needs. But convenience is now being redefined. Were integrating more than 70,000 stores worldwide with a strong digital and e-commerce presence. Through machine learning, artificial intelligence, and next-level mobile technologies, well meetand exceedour customers ever-changing needs. New consumer behaviors and rapid tech development will continue to transform how and when people shop. With the rapid growth of social media and emerging trends in the Internet of Things, customer behavior is changing. We need to transform ourselves into a software organization by building products and experiences for our customers. Our goal is to transform 7-Eleven into a customer-obsessed, digitally enabled organization. The Global Center in India will play a significant role in the transformation journey at 7-Eleven by building products that support business activities at each of our convenience stores.
 Job Description
 7-Eleven needs highly motivated DevOps engineers to create, tune, maintain and build Continuous Integration and Deployment pipelines for the Big Data platforms that drive their retail business. This role is key to 7-Elevens continued market dominance and requires people that are passionate about data and seeking perfection in their development. As a member of the Data DevOps team, you will be working closely with different pods of Data Engineers, Data Scientists and Data Analysts.

 7-Eleven deploys the new data integrations with the Azure Cloud toolset, and you need to be well versed in the following:

 Full Azure Cloud toolset (Azure DevOps, Azure Kubernetes Services, Azure Databricks, Azure SQL DB, PowerBI)
 CI/CD and DevOps
 Broad Cloud Platform knowledge (AWS, Azure, GCP)
 Python/SQL/Powershell
 Spark (Python/SQL)
 Understanding and experience with relational and NoSQL database principles
 Data Application design with cloud micro-services and CI/CD (Docker, etc.) principles


 Basic requirements:

 Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent engineering field.
 3+ years experience with DevOps/Admin on cloud toolsets (AWS or Azure)
 3+ years experience in handling Azure Cloud services including cloud services like Azure DevOps, Azure Databricks, Azure Kubernetes, etc.
 1+ years experience with GCP/Azure Cloud Big Data tools (PowerBI/Data Lake/ Azure Databricks / Azure SQL Data Warehouse)
 Expert knowledge of Big Data technologies in general
 Proficiency in API security frameworks, token management, and UAC including OAuth, JWT etc.


 Your work may be:

 design, implement and maintain cloud environments on the Azure platform.
 Design and implement cloud solutions that are secure, scalable, resilient, monitored, auditable and cost-optimized
 Implement application deployment automation for all stacks using industry-standard deployment and configuration tools.
 Setup the docker container, create docker images, deploy Kubernetes cluster, cluster management for jobs, deployments, and services on multiple AKS clusters.
 Deliver an exceptional experience through the creation of environments and tools that allow organizations to deliver unique and cutting-edge products to customers.
 Work closely with the development teams to brainstorm, design, and implement technical build and deployment solutions.
 Work closely with the infrastructure and production assurance teams to introduce provisioning and deployment automation.
 Research and integrate third-party tools into the cloud platform to support business needs.
 Deploy infrastructure applications and software-defined networking through CI/CD pipeline using Azure DevOps.
 Utilize knowledge in cloud platforms, micro-services architecture, CI/CD solutions, containers, DevOps principles, automation & configuration management tools (Ansible, puppet, chef) to complete daily job duties.
 Conduct automated scripts for admin activities using Azure Databricks, Pyspark, Powershell.


 This is a hands-on position: 80% of your time will be DevOps, admin, coding and the rest is code testing, review, and conducting POCs.

 experience_range : 3-5 years 
 skills : DevOps / CI/CD / Docker / Kubernetes / Powershell / Azure

About Lululemon India Tech Hub
 The Hub is key to our business strategy. Weve grown quickly since our inception in 1998, and our continued global growth through market expansion is one of our five goals. We believe that this strategic investment in the India Tech Hub will support our growth, elevate the athletic apparel shopping experience and increase the global talent pool for our current and future technology needs. The India Tech Hub will help us work smarter and faster across our business's value chain by unlocking the power of data and technology. In this centre, development work will focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Through the Hub, we will expand our capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, Distribution and Logistics, and Corporate Systems. The team in India will work as an extension of the global Technology team on projects of strategic priorities.
 Job Description
 We are looking to hire dynamic Data EngineersforFlow projectto work closely with internal technical teams as well as different facets of the lululemon MPA division. This individual will provide on-going analytical and ETL supports to meet the project needs.

 Responsibilities

 Uses structured tools for analysis and presentation of concepts and models to enhance the BRD
 Develop, maintain and deliver training materials to the supply chain end-users
 Work collaboratively with external consultants, internal & external resources throughout the project lifecycle to ensure system modifications meet business needs
 Support day to day reporting needs where required
 Support production issues as relate to application functionality and integrations
 Excellent spoken and written communication skills (verbal and non-verbal)
 Proven experience in managing data warehouses and ETL pipelines (Min. 2 years)
 Solid scripting capability for analysis and reporting(ANSI SQL)
 Solid experience in RDBMS and NoSql technologies
 Strong analytical skills to support BAs.
 Strong problem-solving skills (Math skills required for data modeling)
 Ability to work as an integration / data engineer.
 Ability to manage and complete multiple tasks within tight deadlines
 Possess expert level understanding of software development practices and project life cycles.
 Working experiencewith Java batch spring boot/ python.
 Working Experience with cloud-native technologies
 Must have: Working experience in dealing with big data and data manipulation.
 Desired:Familiarity with Retail planning / merchandising systems/ supply chain.
 Desired:Familiarity with DevOps practices like CICD pipeline
 Desired: Retail experience is a plus. (fashion retail experience would be ideal)
 Must Have: Working experience with cloud platforms namely AWS
 Must Have:Working experience with large data sets (at least 80 100 GB data)


 experience_range : 5-8 years 
 skills : SQL / RDBMS / NoSQL / Python / AWS / Springboot

About Advance Auto Parts
 Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider that serves both professional installer and do-it-yourself customers. As of October 5, 2019, Advance operated 5,000 stores and 152 Worldpac branches in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. The Company also serves 1,260 independently owned Carquest branded stores across these locations in addition to Mexico, the Bahamas, Turks and Caicos and British Virgin Islands. The Advance Global Capability Center (GCC) in Hyderabad, India, opened in 2019. It is a key enabler and hub of innovation for the company, a place where talented Team Members provide support to our North American-based teams across a variety of functions to deliver on our Mission: Passion for Customers Passion for Yes!
 Job Description
 Essential Duties andResponsibilitiesinclude the following. Other duties may be assigned.

 Establish key metrics and KPIs that reflect the health of our loyalty program and develop automated dashboards/reporting to socialize those metrics to stakeholders
 Work with the SpeedPerks business team to identify loyalty customer pain points and collaboratively drive solutions
 Partner with data scientists and personally drive key business insights by deploying regression, segmentation, and/or machine learning models on complex data sets. Identify data sets that are likely to yield business value by applying these techniques and see model creation through to actual business value generation.
 Analyze customer, transaction, andoperationsdata tofindtrends and patterns,createactionable insights,then helpdesignand executeA|B, Multivariate, and DOE tests to prove your findings.
 Leveragethe latestanalytical toolsand data mining techniques.
 Createpresentationsleveraging data visualization toolsthat clearly and concisely communicate analytical findings and recommendations to keystakeholders.Be very comfortable communicating complex analytical insights in simple to understand business terms.
 Support ad hoc analyticand reportingneedsas requested.


 RequiredQualifications

 Bachelorsin Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Data Analytics, Statistics, orotherrelevantfield.
 1-2years experiencein a quantitative analytics role.
 Experience with dataprogramming and manipulation languages (e.g.SQL, Python).
 Experience with statistics especially hypothesis testing and design of experiments (DOE)
 Understanding of relational databases.
 Ability to clearly communicate business insights both verbally and through presentations


 Preferred Qualifications

 Experiencewith predictive modeling.
 Experience with dashboard tools like PowerBI or Tableau


 experience_range : 4-8 years 
 skills : SQL

 Boeing ecommerce team is currently looking for two Lead Hybris Developer to join their team in Bangalore, India. These positions will focus on supporting the Boeing Global Services (BGS) IT organization. The selected individual will work in the Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center (BIETC) in Bangalore, India. As a Lead or Consultant or Senior* SAP Hybris developer, the selected individual will work with the Boeing India teams and its partners and stakeholders to develop, maintain and improve the ecommerce applications.

 Position Responsibilities:

 The selected candidate for this position will work on development and support of Boeing Global Service (BGS) ecommerce applications that are used to offer various parts, products and services to Business Regional & General Aviation (BRGA) as well as Commercial Airline (CA) customers across the world. This position involves working closely with other development / support teams in India, US and other locations. The selected individual will be a part of the engineering and technology team in Boeing India.

About Lululemon India Tech Hub
 The Hub is key to our business strategy. Weve grown quickly since our inception in 1998, and our continued global growth through market expansion is one of our five goals. We believe that this strategic investment in the India Tech Hub will support our growth, elevate the athletic apparel shopping experience and increase the global talent pool for our current and future technology needs. The India Tech Hub will help us work smarter and faster across our business's value chain by unlocking the power of data and technology. In this centre, development work will focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Through the Hub, we will expand our capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, Distribution and Logistics, and Corporate Systems. The team in India will work as an extension of the global Technology team on projects of strategic priorities.
 Job Description
 Role Responsibilities:

 Support project efforts through building modernized IAM capabilities utilizing standardized frameworks to foster sustainability and growth
 Identify technical and process gaps, foster technical collaboration, stay up-to-date with trends
 Build, enhance and mature identity and access technologies and controls that leverage best practices, aligned to governance controls, and establish solid scalable foundations
 Implement technology workflows and rules to maintain accuracy of data to managed systems
 Provide stellar end-user support with on-going operations tasks, enhancements, and bug fixes
 Maintain and upgrades systems, processes, and other necessary support as part of continuous improvement model
 Collaborate closely with application teams to establish self-service, automation, least privileged access and promote adoption
 Collaborate closely with global IAM team members, cybersecurity, infrastructure, digital and other technology teams to ensure appropriate business resiliency, end-to-end data integrity, GRC (governance, risk, compliance) enforcement controls, and security requirements
 7+ years hands-on project and operations experience, including implementation, maintenance, and maturing enterprise cloud infrastructure and cloud authentication solutions
 5+ years maturing cybersecurity and/or infrastructure solutions
 4+ years of deep technical experience with Azure AD Global or similar SSO, Federation, and MFA solutions at B2E, B2B and/or B2C scale
 4+ yearsof experience with authentication solutions, such as Active Directory and/or other LDAP technologies
 3+ years of experience with Azure IaaS and/or AWS IaaS solutions is preferred
 Experience supporting global regulatory compliant solutions is preferred
 Familiarity with Azure AD China and/or other China IDaaS solutions is a plus
 Expert in SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0, OIDC, JWT, SCIM, LDAP/S, Kerberos protocols
 Expert in network security support and analysis tactics
 Expert in 2 or more coding languages PowerShell, C+, SQL, Python, JavaScript and/or others
 Experience working with Privilege Identity/Access Management (PIM/PAM) solutions is a plus
 Experience working with Microsoft CA and/or PKI solutions is a plus
 Broad knowledge of DEVOPS processes and best practices
 Collaborative team player, who will work closely with IAM and other teams
 Excellent interpersonal, written and verbal skills with an ability to express technical concepts in business terms

About Advance Auto Parts
 Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider that serves both professional installer and do-it-yourself customers. As of October 5, 2019, Advance operated 5,000 stores and 152 Worldpac branches in the United States, Canada, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. The Company also serves 1,260 independently owned Carquest branded stores across these locations in addition to Mexico, the Bahamas, Turks and Caicos and British Virgin Islands. The Advance Global Capability Center (GCC) in Hyderabad, India, opened in 2019. It is a key enabler and hub of innovation for the company, a place where talented Team Members provide support to our North American-based teams across a variety of functions to deliver on our Mission: Passion for Customers Passion for Yes!

About 7-Eleven
 For 90 years, 7-Eleven has been successfully meeting customers needs. But convenience is now being redefined. Were integrating more than 70,000 stores worldwide with a strong digital and e-commerce presence. Through machine learning, artificial intelligence, and next-level mobile technologies, well meetand exceedour customers ever-changing needs. New consumer behaviors and rapid tech development will continue to transform how and when people shop. With the rapid growth of social media and emerging trends in the Internet of Things, customer behavior is changing. We need to transform ourselves into a software organization by building products and experiences for our customers. Our goal is to transform 7-Eleven into a customer-obsessed, digitally enabled organization. The Global Center in India will play a significant role in the transformation journey at 7-Eleven by building products that support business activities at each of our convenience stores.
 Job Description
 7-Eleven needs highly motivated DevOps engineers to create, tune, maintain and build Continuous Integration and Deployment pipelines for the Big Data platforms that drive their retail business. This role is key to 7-Elevens continued market dominance and requires people that are passionate about data and seeking perfection in their development. As a member of the Data DevOps team, you will be working closely with different pods of Data Engineers, Data Scientists and Data Analysts.

 7-Eleven deploys the new data integrations with the Azure Cloud toolset, and you need to be well versed in the following:

 Full Azure Cloud toolset (Azure DevOps, Azure Kubernetes Services, Azure Databricks, Azure SQL DB, PowerBI)
 CI/CD and DevOps
 Broad Cloud Platform knowledge (AWS, Azure, GCP)
 Python/SQL/Powershell
 Spark (Python/SQL)
 Understanding and experience with relational and NoSQL database principles
 Data Application design with cloud micro-services and CI/CD (Docker, etc.) principles


 Basic requirements:

 Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent engineering field.
 3+ years experience with DevOps/Admin on cloud toolsets (AWS or Azure)
 3+ years experience in handling Azure Cloud services including cloud services like Azure DevOps, Azure Databricks, Azure Kubernetes, etc.
 1+ years experience with GCP/Azure Cloud Big Data tools (PowerBI/Data Lake/ Azure Databricks / Azure SQL Data Warehouse)
 Expert knowledge of Big Data technologies in general
 Proficiency in API security frameworks, token management, and UAC including OAuth, JWT etc.


 Your work may be:

 design, implement and maintain cloud environments on the Azure platform.
 Design and implement cloud solutions that are secure, scalable, resilient, monitored, auditable and cost-optimized
 Implement application deployment automation for all stacks using industry-standard deployment and configuration tools.
 Setup the docker container, create docker images, deploy Kubernetes cluster, cluster management for jobs, deployments, and services on multiple AKS clusters.
 Deliver an exceptional experience through the creation of environments and tools that allow organizations to deliver unique and cutting-edge products to customers.
 Work closely with the development teams to brainstorm, design, and implement technical build and deployment solutions.
 Work closely with the infrastructure and production assurance teams to introduce provisioning and deployment automation.
 Research and integrate third-party tools into the cloud platform to support business needs.
 Deploy infrastructure applications and software-defined networking through CI/CD pipeline using Azure DevOps.
 Utilize knowledge in cloud platforms, micro-services architecture, CI/CD solutions, containers, DevOps principles, automation & configuration management tools (Ansible, puppet, chef) to complete daily job duties.
 Conduct automated scripts for admin activities using Azure Databricks, Pyspark, Powershell.


 This is a hands-on position: 80% of your time will be DevOps, admin, coding and the rest is code testing, review, and conducting POCs.

The India Tech Hub will help us work smarter and faster across our business's value chain by unlocking the power of data and technology. In this centre, development work will focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Through the Hub, we will expand our capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, Distribution and Logistics, and Corporate Systems. The team in India will work as an extension of the global Technology team on projects of strategic priorities.
 Job Description
 Role Requirements:

 12+ years experience in software development
 8+ years of experience in DevOps
 Experience with the following Cloud Native tools: Git, Jenkins, Grafana, Prometheus, Ansible, Artifactory, Vault, Splunk, Consul, Terraform, Kubernetes
 Demonstrable experience with configuration, orchestration, and automation tools such as Jenkins, Puppet, Ansible, Maven, and Ant to provide full stack integration
 Working knowledge of Containers, i.e., Docker Kubernetes, ideally with experience transitioning an organization through its adoption
 Strong working knowledge of enterprise platforms, tools and principles including Web Services, Load Balancers, Shell Scripting, Authentication, IT Security, and Performance Tuning
 Demonstrated understanding of system resiliency, redundancy, failovers, and disaster recovery
 Experience working with a variety of vendor APIs including cloud, physical and logical infrastructure devices
 Strong working knowledge of Cloud offerings & Cloud DevOps Services (EC2, ECS, IAM, Lambda, Cloud services, AWS Code Build, Code Deploy, Code Pipeline etc. or Azure DevOps, API management, PaaS)
 Experience managing and deploying Infrastructure as Code, using tools like Terraform Helm charts etc.
 Manage and maintain standards for Devops tools used by the team
 Administering the cloud environments (Prod, Dev, and QA)
 Acknowledges the presence of choice in every moment and takes personal responsibility for their life.
 Possesses an entrepreneurial spirit and continuously innovates to achieve great results.
 Communicates with honesty and kindness, and creates the space for others to do the same.
 Leads with courage, knowing the possibility of greatness is bigger than the fear of failure.
 Fosters connection by putting people first and building trusting relationships.
 Integrates fun and joy as a way of being and working, aka doesnt take themselves too seriously.


 experience_range : 10-15 years 
 skills : DevOps / Terraform / AWS / Docker / Kubernetes

About Telstra

 We’re Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India which is home to our new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore, and a presence across Pune and Hyderabad. Here, we’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.

 The role with us

 The Software Engineer will work within feature teams delivering into Telstra’s B2B Full Stack Development using high performance software engineering methods – ServiceNow, Agile and APIGEE. The role will include all aspects of delivery: design, development, testing, devops tool chains (CI/CD) and devops work on production systems. The software engineer will have functional knowledge of the B2B Full Stack Development domain and experience of agile high velocity delivery.

 Key responsibilities

 Development knowledge in ServiceNow using REST API’s
 Develop, Deploy and improve specific technologies and their interaction with Telstra processes and systems to deliver products and services to customer business units
 Achieve a well-defined, functioning and repeatable set of key business, with product owners and technology processes to ensure consistent quality is maintained
 Perform application performance, load analysis and assist in capacity planning as required to support the solution
 Peer Review and integrate all application requirements, including functional, security, integration, performance, quality, and operations requirements
 Learn new technologies quickly and able to implement the same
 Technology Assessments and Estimation of new features
 Participate into Technology POCs and technical forums to share knowledge


 About you

 To be successful in the role, you'll bring skills and experience in:

 3+ years of experience
 Experience in ServiceNow, Scripting, and having good knowledge of Integrations.
 Understanding of ITSM, ITOM CMDB Services development using REST (XML, JSON), version control (Git).
 Understanding with Continuous Integration and Delivery pipelines concepts
 Back-end: REST, JSON, Java, XML
 Front-end: ServiceNow, Angular.js, jQuery.


 If this opportunity sounds like a perfect fit for you, we'd encourage you to apply!

We also offer flexibility in all our roles, to ensure everyone can participate. T Senior Software Engineer 

Be a part of a team that’s ensuring Dell Technologies' product integrity and customer satisfaction. Our IT Software Engineer team turns business requirements into technology solutions by designing, coding and testing/debugging applications, as well as documenting procedures for use and constantly seeking quality improvements.

 Join us as a Senior Software Engineer on our Information Technology team in Bangalore/Hyderabad to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

 What you’ll achieve
 As an IT Senior Software Engineer, you will deliver products and improvements for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, you will craft and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics — all with the most sophisticated technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and partnerships.
  
You will:


Design specifications for high availability and highly scalable applications which will be used by both internal and external customers
Work with clients and business analysts to settle software requirements and system impacts
Manage projects with small to moderate budgets; may perform in project leadership role and/or supervise the activities of lower-level personnel
Conduct and supervise production launches and post-launch support, coordinating with geographically distributed teams in conference calls


 Take the first step towards your dream career
 Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
 
 Essential Requirements

 5-8 years of validated experience in .Net Core
 Hand on experience in developing Web API
 Hands on experience in Typescript and any UI framework like Angular JS, React JS or Knockout JS
 Advanced knowledge of automated testing tools and procedures


 Desirable Requirements

 5-8 years of validated experience in .net development
 Experience in developing and deploying cloud native applications


 Here’s our story; now tell us yours

 Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.  What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life - while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.  We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.  You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here. At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.
 Overview

 Boeing is the world’s largest (Per Boeing LinkedIn page) aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Building on a legacy of over a century of innovation and leadership, Boeing continues to lead the way in technology and innovation, customer delivery, and investment in its people and future growth of aerospace.

 In India, Boeing has been a strong partner to the Indian aerospace and defense sectors for more than 75 years. People at Boeing have been supporting mission readiness and modernization of India’s defense forces, and enabling connected, safer, and smarter flying experiences, in the sky, in the seas, and in space.

 Technology for today and tomorrow

 The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) is a 3000+ diverse engineering workforce that contributes to global aerospace growth. Our engineers deliver cutting-edge R&D, innovation, and high-quality engineering work in global markets, and leverage new-age technologies such as AI/ML, IIoT, Cloud, Model-Based Engineering, and Additive Manufacturing, shaping the future of aerospace.

 People-driven culture

 At Boeing, we believe creativity and innovation thrives when every employee is trusted, empowered, and has the flexibility to choose, grow, learn, and explore. We offer variable arrangements depending upon business and customer needs, and professional pursuits that offer greater flexibility in the way our people work. We also believe that collaboration, frequent team engagements, and face-to-face meetings bring diverse perspectives and thoughts – enabling every voice to be heard and every perspective to be respected. No matter where or how our teammates work, we are committed to positively shaping people’s careers and being thoughtful about employee wellbeing.

 At Boeing, we are inclusive, diverse, and transformative.
 With us, you can create and contribute to what matters most in your career, community, country, and world. Join us in powering the progress of global aerospace.

 At Boeing, we are all innovators on a mission to connect, protect, explore and inspire. From the seabed to outer space, you’ll learn and grow, contributing to work that shapes the world. Find your future with us.

 At the highest level, diversity and inclusion are part of Boeing's values. Having diverse employees, business partners and community relationships is vital to creating advanced aerospace and defense products and services for our diverse customers around the world. The company's commitment to diversity means providing a work environment for all employees that is welcoming, respectful and engaging, with opportunities for personal and professional development.

 Job Description & Responsibilities:
 Refer to "Supplemental Information" for further clarification on the use of this job family. In locations where SPEEA representation applies, this job family will be covered by the terms of the collective bargaining agreement. Applicable and appropriate educational/certification credentials from an accredited institution and/or equivalent experience is required.


 Able to produce a User Interface design specification for the current product UI implementation. This person must be able to use UX best practices to identify key usability issues with the existing product and justify development investments in terms of user productivity benefits.
 Works with the Boeing Digital Solutions & Analytics Global Product Design team using a common UXD frame-work and delivers superior user experiences across the portfolio of solutions in a uniform and standardized manner.
 Collaborates on the evolution of the UX/UI standards with the Boeing Digital Aviation Global Product Design team.
 Works closely with Bangalore development team on approved design processes, tools and technology.
 Can follow the broad set of business requirements from business stakeholders and contribute towards designs solutions using user-centered design principles.
 Uses UX best practices to identify key usability issues.
 Collaborates with cross functional teams including Boeing Digital Solutions & Analytics Global Product Design, product management, business analysis, and engineering to define, design and implement clear, contemporary/modern, and consistent solutions for the product direction that are consistent with the established design standards.
 Provides periodic updates to Boeing project teams and Design manager in the form of progress reports, project summaries, and other related documents.
 Coordinates and communicates regularly with experts in Boeing organizations around the world including design collaboration and design reviews with Boeing Digital Solutions & Analytics Global Product Design.
 This position is in the Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center (BIETC) in India.
 This position will support initiatives of Boeing India organization related to engineering excellence, employee development, mentoring, customer engagement etc.
 This position may require some travel within India and internationally.


 Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.

 Required Skills:

 Technical Bachelor's degree or Master degree


 Full-stack software Architecture Expertise, Designing and Developing full stack modules and components for web applications (frontend and backend services)
 Exposure to Cloud native architectures, Micro-services, Micro frontends, Webservices, etc
 Experience in designing UX for simplifying user experience and dashboards for viewing high volume of information
 Generation of animations, annotations, image analysis, video analysis, labelling, tagging media content
 Experience in writing scripts and work instructions
 Experience in video game development (narrative paths and analysis, rules sets analysis)
 Experience in developing board games (rule sets, physical interfaces.)
 Development of Survey Tools and Scorecards
 Gamification Frameworks
 Must have hands-on work experience with Sketch and In Vision.
 Good to have applied experience using Apple HIG design standards.
 Must have significant applied experience using Google’s Material Design standards for web apps.
 Must have strong applied experience in User Experience Design (UXD) including human interaction design, user/persona research, interface design, usability optimization, UXD frame-work and architecture across multiple devices and platforms.
 Demonstrated ability to create positive impact for customers by developing polished, cohesive, effective, and user-friendly applications for large and complex aviation systems.
 Ability to understand and communicate with technical experts over a wide range of technical topics.
 Must be able to work with team members and partners to accomplish project and departmental goals and objectives.
 Teamwork is important in this position; individual must have strong teambuilding skills. Must have demonstrated ability to accomplish results through colleagues in other parts of Boeing, and partners, even when they are not direct reports. Ability to work well on virtual teams across multiple time-zones.
 Understands the structured, iterative, and agile software development processes.
 Must be flexible, with a high tolerance for organizational complexity and ability to work with partners from within Boeing and outside.
 Communication – strong written and verbal communication skills, ability to prepare comprehensive reports, proposals, Statements of Work, and connect technology to business considerations (e.g., ROI). Candidate must be fluent in English, and have expertise in using MS Office tools using Apple laptops.
 Candidate must be a self-starter with a positive attitude, high ethics, and a track record of working successfully under pressure in a time-constrained environment.
 Experience with user interface prototyping techniques is a plus.


 Qualifications:

 4+ years of relevant hands on experience in UX (User Experience).
 Bachelor’s degree in Human Computer Interaction/User Experience Design, or equivalent experience, is required. A Master’s degree is preferred.
 Candidates with experience in Aviation domain will be preferred.
 Experience working in a global organization is preferred.


 Preferred Qualifications (Experience):

 Bachelor, Master or equivalent degree preferably in Computer Science or Engineering


 Typical Education & Experience:
 Education/experience typically acquired through advanced education (e.g. Bachelor) and typically 5 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience (e.g. Master+ 04 years' related work experience.

 Boeing is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military/veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

WHAT YOU'LL DO

   As a part of BCG’s GAMMA A&S team you will work closely with consulting teams on a diverse range of advanced analytics topics. You will have the opportunity to leverage analytical methodologies to deliver value to BCG's Consulting (case) teams and Practice Areas (domain) through providing analytics subject matter expertise, and accelerated execution support.
  
 You will collaborate with case teams to gather requirements, specify, design, develop, deliver and support analytic solutions serving client needs. You will provide technical support through deeper understanding of relevant data analytics solutions and processes to build high quality and efficient analytic solutions.
  

YOU'RE GOOD AT Working with case (and proposal) teams 
 
Acquiring deep expertise in at least one analytics topic & understanding of all analytics capabilities


 Defining and explaining expected analytics outcome; defining approach selection
 Delivering original analysis and insights to BCG teams, typically owning all or part of an analytics module and integrating with case teams
 Establishing credibility by thought partnering with case teams on analytics topics; drawing conclusions on a range of external and internal issues related to their module
 Communicating analytical insights through sophisticated synthesis and packaging of results (including PowerPoint presentation, Documents, dashboard and charts) with consultants, collects, synthesizes, analyses case team learning & inputs into new best practices and methodologies 
Build collateral of documents for enhancing core capabilities and supporting reference for internal documents; sanitizing confidential documents and maintaining a repository 
Able to lead workstreams and modules independently or with minimal supervision 
Ability to support business development activities (proposals, vignettes etc.) and build sales collateral to generate leads

 Team requirements:
 
 Guides juniors on analytical methodologies and platforms, and helps in quality checks
 Contributes to team’s content & IP development
 Imparts technical trainings to team members and consulting cohort

 Communicating with confidence and ease
 
 You will be a clear and confident communicator, able to deliver messages in a concise manner with strong and effective written and verbal communication.

 Thinking Analytically 

You should be strong in analytical solutioning with hands on experience in advanced analytics delivery, through the entire life cycle of analytics. Strong analytics skills with the ability to develop and codify knowledge and provide analytical advice where required.

 Technical expertise
 
 Advanced Excel
 Application development in VBA
 Text mining & unstructured data analytics a plus
 Familiarity with a broad base of analytics tools a plus:
 Data management: e.g. Excel, SQL, PostGRESql, Hadoop/Hive, Alteryx, …
 Data visualization: Tableau
 Expertise in Power BI
 Analytics platforms: e.g. SAS, R, RapidMiner, SPSS, …
 Experience in core analytics methods a plus:
 Statistics (t-tests, ANOVA, …), variable reduction (FA, PCA, …)
 Segmentation/clustering techniques

 Functional Skills:
 
 Hands-on experience in building analytical solutions and delivering tangible business value for clients (in one or more of the below use cases) 
Price optimization, promotion effectiveness, Product assortment optimization and Sales-force effectiveness
 CLM and revenue enhancement (segmentation, cross-sell/up-sell, next product to buy, offer recommendation, loyalty, LTV maximization and churn prevention)



YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS)

 Bachelor/Master’s degree in a field linked to business analytics, statistics or economics, operations research, applied mathematics, computer science, engineering, or related field required; advanced degree preferred
 At least 4-6 years of relevant industry work experience providing analytics solutions in a commercial setting or 2-4 years of experience with advance degree
 Prior work experience in a global organization, preferably in a professional services organization in data analytics role
 Demonstrated depth in one or more industries not limited to but including Retail, CPG, Heatlhcare, Telco etc.

 YOU'LL WORK WITH Our knowledge and research specialists collaborate with global colleagues across BCG to bring expertise and capabilities to the service of our clients. Our team is made up of a diverse pool of knowledge and research positions that allow us to pursue exciting, innovative research careers.
  ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

   BCG GAMMA A&S combines innovative skills in computer science, artificial intelligence, statistics, and machine learning with deep industry expertise. The BCG GAMMA A&S team is comprised of data engineers, data scientists and business consultants who specialize in the use of advanced analytics to get high-impact business results. Our teams own the full analytics value-chain end to end: framing the business problem, building the data, designing innovative algorithms, creating scale through designing tools and apps, and training colleagues and clients in new solutions. Here at BCG GAMMA A&S, you’ll have the chance to work with clients in every BCG region and every industry area. We are also a core member of a rapidly growing Digital enterprise at BCG – a constellation of teams focused on driving practical results for BCG clients by applying leading edge analytics approaches, data, and technology.

 About Colgate-Palmolive

 Do you want to explore the opportunity of working with a smile and leave with one as well? In between those smiles, your day consists of working in a global organization, continually learning and collaborating, having stimulating discussions, and making impactful contributions!

 If this is how you see your career, Colgate is the place to be!

 Our conscientious household brands, dedicated employees, and sustainability commitments make us a company passionate about building a future to smile about for our employees, consumers, and surrounding communities. The pride in our brand fuels a workplace that encourages creative thinking, champions experimentation, and promotes authenticity which has supported our enduring success.

 Opportunity to work for a company that lives by their values, then give your career a reason to smile...every single day.

 The Experience


 In today’s multifaceted technology environment, its right time to belong to the information technology team at Colgate. Our highly technical and innovative team is designated to drive growth for Colgate Palmolive in a landscape that is constantly evolving.


 Role as a team member


 Test developer is primarily responsible for developing robust testing automation solutions. This role requires the ability to work with Functional, business & application specialists to understand requirements and transform into a solution. Will be responsible to craft, develop and test to build quality solutions.


 Role as a function specialist -

About Lululemon India Tech Hub
 The Hub is key to our business strategy. Weve grown quickly since our inception in 1998, and our continued global growth through market expansion is one of our five goals. We believe that this strategic investment in the India Tech Hub will support our growth, elevate the athletic apparel shopping experience and increase the global talent pool for our current and future technology needs. The India Tech Hub will help us work smarter and faster across our business's value chain by unlocking the power of data and technology. In this centre, development work will focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Through the Hub, we will expand our capabilities in Product Systems, Merchandising and Planning, Digital Presence, Distribution and Logistics, and Corporate Systems. Senior Software Engineer 
Join us as a Senior Software Engineer on our APEX team in Bangalore to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.
 What you’ll achieve
 APEX is defining the future of Dell Technologies – and the APEX Console is the central pane of glass for delivering all APEX offers to our customers. It’s a singular orchestration platform across the company for our customers to engage with Dell Technologies.  We are looking for a senior software engineer to drive the design and implementation of APEX's cloud security features, architecture and capabilities. The ideal candidate would be a hands-on technical leader and a team player who believes in building trust with our customers and has a passion for embedding security into the core foundation of the next-generation cloud-based IT infrastructure.
 You will:

 Design and develop cloud-based security capabilities, focusing on Identity and Access Management (IAM), Data Encryption and Protection, Network Security, and Cloud Platform Security.
 Research emerging security technologies and propose innovative, cutting-edge solutions to improve APEX security posture and capabilities continuously.
 Develop functional and design specifications to support product requirements
 Develop component-level test plans and automation to validate security functionalities
 Help foster teamwork and collaboration. Lead by example to help build a winning engineering culture

 Take the first step towards your dream career
 Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:
 Essential Requirements 

5+ years of extensive experience in software development, using web APIs and languages such as C++, Java, Python, and Rust, with 3+ years in the security domain
 Hands-on experience in designing and implementing cloud security capabilities with AWS, GCP, OCI and/or Azure
 Expertise in Identity and Access Management (IAM), Encryption, PKI, CI/CD Security, security Logging, and monitoring
 Knowledge of distributed systems, networking, and database fundamentals
 Experience with VMware/Hyper-V, Kubernetes, and container-based environments

 Desirable Requirements 

Self-motivating and ability to lead and drive technical initiatives with limited direction
 Critical thinking skills and the courage to challenge conventional approaches to solve problems in a fast-paced environment
 Curiosity about new security technologies and concepts

 Here’s our story; now tell us yours
 Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.
 What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life - while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.
 We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.
 You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.

 CTIO Firmware & Low-level Software Stack

Sphere of influence likely to involve external individuals. May actively seek customer input and take responsibility for internal and external customer situations. Research, evaluate and contribute to project plans and budgets for new products or updates to existing products.  ARM Based

  Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:  Essential Requirements





 Strong firmware / System development background with strong C/C++ development/debug skills is mandatory. Knowledge with Bare metal OS provisioning as well as NVMe Presentation and SW RAID Stack mandatory
 Very good Server/Storage/Network system architecture understanding, along with Power and Thermal domain expertise with a solid understanding of Networking/Storage protocols like SAS, SCSI, SATA, iSCSI, FCoE, LLDP is a plus.
 Strong in Embedded Linux programming, OS Internals, memory management, IPC, thread programming and embedded application software development. With a solid understanding of SNMP, IPMI protocols. Experience/exposure to SMBUS, LPC, I2C, MCTP, NCSI, PLDM, uEFI protocol.






 Proficient in software development tools such as IDEs, compilers, debuggers, emulators, source control system and defect/ bug tracking systems.
 Prior work experience as a lead dealing with cross functional teams, partners / vendors, open sources and standards.

 Experience with Server, Storage, Network product architectures

About 7-Eleven
 For 90 years, 7-Eleven has been successfully meeting customers needs. But convenience is now being redefined. Were integrating more than 70,000 stores worldwide with a strong digital and e-commerce presence. Through machine learning, artificial intelligence, and next-level mobile technologies, well meetand exceedour customers ever-changing needs. New consumer behaviors and rapid tech development will continue to transform how and when people shop. With the rapid growth of social media and emerging trends in the Internet of Things, customer behavior is changing. We need to transform ourselves into a software organization by building products and experiences for our customers. Our goal is to transform 7-Eleven into a customer-obsessed, digitally enabled organization. The Global Center in India will play a significant role in the transformation journey at 7-Eleven by building products that support business activities at each of our convenience stores.
 Job Description
 Position Overview
 We are seeking a creative, hands-on, talented engineer to be a member of the 7-Eleven Global platform development team.
 As a Full-Stack Engineer, youll using cutting-edge open source frameworks, all on the cloud. You will bring solid experience in emerging and traditional technologies such as: Spring Boot, Node.js, React Native, REST, JSON, HTML5, CSS, Selenium, NGINX, Kubernetes, Express, Chef, Docker, NoSql databases and Git/Github/Bitbucket. You will be fully utilizing AWS with services such as Cloud Formation Templates, S3, EC2, EKS, Lambda, Route53, CloudFront, API Gateway (Apigee), and many more.

 Requirements:

 Hands-on with building UI using Angular/React with Typescript, Node.js, CSS/SCSS and HTML
 Hands-on backend microservices & API development using Java Spring Boot, REST, JSON, Docker, NoSql databases, MongoDB/PostgreSQL and Tomcat with full ownership of software architecture, design and development
 Collaborate with and across Agile teams to design, develop, test, implement, and support technical solutions in a full-stack development tools and technologies and partner with Product/Business teams


 Qualifications

 Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or IT
 5+ years of experience developing front end & orchestration layers technologies: Java Spring Boot, Angular/React/Vue, Node JS, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML 5, and CSS
 At least 4 years of experience developing RESTful APIs
 4+ years of experience in one of Cloud technologies
 4+ Experience developing with large microservice-based architectures, container orchestration frameworks: Kubernetes/Amazon EKS
 4+ years of experience in a database technology, preferably No-SQL such as AWS DynamoDB
 2+ years experience using Jenkins, Github, Bitbucket, Spinaker
 2+ years of experience with a Junit, Selenium, Cucumber JS unit testing library (Jest, Mocha) 5+ years of overall software development experience
 Experience in emerging and traditional technologies such as: Node.js, React, REST, JSON, Java Spring Boot, HTML5, CSS / SCSS, Selenium, NGINX, Kubernetes, Express, Chef, Docker, NoSql databases and Git/Github/Bitbucket.
 React/React Native/Angular

column1: Machine Learning Engineer | Data Engineer | Data Scientist
column4:
Desired Candidate Profile
Tidyquant is looking for ML Engineer/Data Scientist/Data Engineer to join our Data Team. The desired candidate should be enthusiastic, passionate, and looking to develop a career in Data Science. The individual will be part of a team whose mission is to establish the core capability to transform Tidyquant into a data-driven & data-first company.
We are looking for an individual who has Python programming skills, knowledge of Django Framework & statistical knowledge, but most importantly has a thirst for solving real-world problems using advanced Data Science techniques.
Data is often messy (unstructured), and located in many different places (e.g.: AWS S3, MySQL, Blob Storage, etc.). The individual must have a problem-solving mentality in order to create actionable insights that can be transformed into value in a business area.
The role will combine a wide range of technical skills with business knowledge to turn vast quantities of data into value. The role will primarily focus on advanced data science and complex analytics, but the candidate will also have the capability to perform ETL processes ( extract, transform & load).
The Data Scientist job role covers a number of different core competencies, the candidate should be able to perform some or most of the following:
- Understanding of Django Framework
- Machine Learning
- Analytics
- Python Programming
- Visualization
- Data ingestion, Model preparation, and Model validation
- Automation
- Business knowledge
- Problem Solving
- Project Delivery

· Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (classification, regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.).
· Healthcare experience preferred
· Process optimizations experience preferred
· Problem solving, critical thinking, creativity, organizational, design, interpersonal, communication (written, verbal and listening) skills.
· Desire to be an expert in healthcare and passionate about making an impact in this field.
· Good written and verbal communication skill is must.
Job Roles & Responsibilities:
· Utilizing your intellectual curiosity, partner with stakeholders throughout the organization to leverage company data and drive business solutions.
· Mine and analyze data from various healthcare data, including EHR/EMR, claim data, Medical notes, medical prescription data, lab data and other healthcare data, and use predictive modeling to drive optimization and improvement of product development.
· Build complex data transformations and statistical models using Python, SQL, or R.
· Perform in EDA, scenario modeling, forecasting and simulations on large datasets.
· Ingest, transform, cleanse and augment internal and external data assets. Automate data pipelines to process patient-level and aggregated public health data.
· Employ responsible principles of Machine learning to ensure models are transparent, relevant, and properly used.
· Collaborate, coordinate, and communicate results to business stalk-holders.
Job Types: Full-time, Contractual / Temporary
Pay: Up to ₹2,200,000.00 per year
Schedule:

Day shift

Ability to commute/relocate:

NCR, Delhi: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)

Experience:

total work: 4 years (Preferred)

We are looking for an experienced data analyst with between 4 to 8 years of experience to join our team. Who will support our product, sales, leadership and marketing teams with insights gained from analyzing company data. They must have strong experience using a variety of data mining/data analysis methods, using a variety of data tools, building and implementing models, using/creating algorithms and creating/running simulations.
You should have strong analytical skills and the ability to combine data from different sources and have familiarity with several programming languages and knowledge of machine learning methods. Overall, you’ll strive for efficiency by aligning data systems with business goals.
About Momspresso: 
At Momspresso, we are driven by our purpose of empowering women to express themselves and earn through our platform. 65000 Creators share blogs and vlogs in 10 different languages through the app, making us India's largest user-generated content platform for women, with 30 million of them visiting the site every month. The micro-influencer platform Momspresso MyMoney enables women to earn by participating in marketing campaigns from brands they use and love.
We are part of Honasa Consumer Pvt Ltd, owners of the Mamaearth brand, which recently became a unicorn. They are backed by Sequoia, Fireside Ventures and Sofina.
Our mission, over the next 3 years, is to create a ‘network’ that touches every woman in India. Brands will leverage this network through ‘word-of-mouth’ marketing campaigns and eventually for commerce. We believe that this is a highly disruptive idea that challenges the current paradigm in which brands operate. So if you want to become a part of our growth journey we would love to meet you or discuss this opportunity in detail.
Who can fit in: 
We are in a challenging growth-phase which means you have immense opportunities for personal and professional growth. From our experience, we have observed that some people fit in and thrive in our work environment better than others.Responsibilities: 

Responsible for handling and integrating large volumes of data from various sources.


Responsible for mining the data and coming up with actionable insights


Create interactive dashboards, pivots, and presentations to help contribute to a more competitive, proactive business strategy


Interpret business problem and structure analytical solutions


Develop self-service dashboards to enable business users to access data and insights


Develop models for optimization of marketing and sales spend

Skill Required: 

Bachelor’s degree with additional 4 years experience in the analytics domain, 2+ years of modelling experience which covers the implementation of various statistical models


Proficient with scripting and/or programming language, e.g. Python, R(Optional), SQL; advanced knowledge of data processing, database programming and data analytics tools and techniques


Familiarity with Data Design Principles, expertise in customer insight Experience with visualization/reporting tools like Tableau, MetaBase is required


Extensive background in data mining, modelling and statistical analysis (e.g. Linear


and logistic regression, time series analysis, clustering, decision trees etc); able to understand various data structures and common methods in data transformation


Anyone who had applied multivariate linear regression, predictive modelling, deep learning algorithms concepts in real-world along with their application


Experience in articulating and translating business questions and using statistical


techniques to arrive at an answer using available data.

What you can expect: 

A work environment that will help you take initiatives, allow you to fail and allows you to reflect & improve


An exposure to top management & key decision makers in the company


An end-to-end understanding of how the business evolves and key challenges at each phase


A great opportunity for professional & personal growth in a high growth environment


An opportunity to work with & learn from a strong team of colleagues

Desired Candidate Profile
Tidyquant is looking for ML Engineer/Data Scientist/Data Engineer to join our Data Team. The desired candidate should be enthusiastic, passionate, and looking to develop a career in Data Science. The individual will be part of a team whose mission is to establish the core capability to transform Tidyquant into a data-driven & data-first company.
We are looking for an individual who has Python programming skills, knowledge of Django Framework & statistical knowledge, but most importantly has a thirst for solving real-world problems using advanced Data Science techniques.
Data is often messy (unstructured), and located in many different places (e.g.: AWS S3, MySQL, Blob Storage, etc.). The individual must have a problem-solving mentality in order to create actionable insights that can be transformed into value in a business area.
The role will combine a wide range of technical skills with business knowledge to turn vast quantities of data into value. The role will primarily focus on advanced data science and complex analytics, but the candidate will also have the capability to perform ETL processes ( extract, transform & load).
The Data Scientist job role covers a number of different core competencies, the candidate should be able to perform some or most of the following:
- Understanding of Django Framework
- Machine Learning
- Analytics
- Python Programming
- Visualization
- Data ingestion, Model preparation, and Model validation
- Automation
- Business knowledge
- Problem Solving
- Project Delivery
Perks and Benefits
- Company Laptop
- Accessories (Headphones, laptop stand, keyboard n mouse)
- 25 Annual Holidays
- 100% remote work

Salary: ₹20,000.00 - ₹40,000.00 per month

Leave encashment
Work from home

At Momspresso, we are driven by our purpose of empowering women to express themselves and earn through our platform. 65000 Creators share blogs and vlogs in 10 different languages through the app, making us India's largest user-generated content platform for women, with 30 million of them visiting the site every month. The micro-influencer platform Momspresso MyMoney enables women to earn by participating in marketing campaigns from brands they use and love.
We are part of Honasa Consumer Pvt Ltd, owners of the Mamaearth brand, which recently became a unicorn. They are backed by Sequoia, Fireside Ventures and Sofina.
Our mission, over the next 3 years, is to create a ‘network’ that touches every woman in India. Brands will leverage this network through ‘word-of-mouth’ marketing campaigns and eventually for commerce. We believe that this is a highly disruptive idea that challenges the current paradigm in which brands operate. So if you want to become a part of our growth journey we would love to meet you or discuss this opportunity in detail.
Who can fit in: 
We are in a challenging growth-phase which means you have immense opportunities for personal and professional growth. From our experience, we have observed that some people fit in and thrive in our work environment better than others.Responsibilities: 

Responsible for handling and integrating large volumes of data from various sources.


Responsible for mining the data and coming up with actionable insights


Create interactive dashboards, pivots, and presentations to help contribute to a more competitive, proactive business strategy


Interpret business problem and structure analytical solutions


Develop self-service dashboards to enable business users to access data and insights


Develop models for optimization of marketing and sales spend

Skill Required: 

Bachelor’s degree with additional 4 years experience in the analytics domain, 2+ years of modelling experience which covers the implementation of various statistical models


Proficient with scripting and/or programming language, e.g. Python, R(Optional), SQL; advanced knowledge of data processing, database programming and data analytics tools and techniques


Familiarity with Data Design Principles, expertise in customer insight Experience with visualization/reporting tools like Tableau, MetaBase is required


Extensive background in data mining, modelling and statistical analysis (e.g. Linear


and logistic regression, time series analysis, clustering, decision trees etc); able to understand various data structures and common methods in data transformation


Anyone who had applied multivariate linear regression, predictive modelling, deep learning algorithms concepts in real-world along with their application


Experience in articulating and translating business questions and using statistical


techniques to arrive at an answer using available data.

What you can expect: 

A work environment that will help you take initiatives, allow you to fail and allows you to reflect & improve


An exposure to top management & key decision makers in the company


An end-to-end understanding of how the business evolves and key challenges at each phase


A great opportunity for professional & personal growth in a high growth environment


An opportunity to work with & learn from a strong team of colleagues

Desired Candidate Profile
Tidyquant is looking for ML Engineer/Data Scientist/Data Engineer to join our Data Team. The desired candidate should be enthusiastic, passionate, and looking to develop a career in Data Science. The individual will be part of a team whose mission is to establish the core capability to transform Tidyquant into a data-driven & data-first company.
We are looking for an individual who has Python programming skills, knowledge of Django Framework & statistical knowledge, but most importantly has a thirst for solving real-world problems using advanced Data Science techniques.
Data is often messy (unstructured), and located in many different places (e.g.: AWS S3, MySQL, Blob Storage, etc.). The individual must have a problem-solving mentality in order to create actionable insights that can be transformed into value in a business area.
The role will combine a wide range of technical skills with business knowledge to turn vast quantities of data into value. The role will primarily focus on advanced data science and complex analytics, but the candidate will also have the capability to perform ETL processes ( extract, transform & load).
The Data Scientist job role covers a number of different core competencies, the candidate should be able to perform some or most of the following:
- Understanding of Django Framework
- Machine Learning
- Analytics
- Python Programming
- Visualization
- Data ingestion, Model preparation, and Model validation
- Automation
- Business knowledge
- Problem Solving
- Project Delivery
Perks and Benefits
- Company Laptop
- Accessories (Headphones, laptop stand, keyboard n mouse)
- 25 Annual Holidays
- 100% remote work
